title: JSON Text
description: An object describing the colors and fonts used in a keycap set

font_family.description: The font family to use when rendering text. Must be installed.

font_weight.description: The CSS font weight to use when rendering the default text.

font_size_px.description: The size of the font in pixels to use when rendering the default text.

unit_size.description: The total width in pixels a single 1u keycap occupies, including any margin. The 100x100 icon SVGs are scaled to this dimension.

base_size.description: The base width in pixels of a 1u keycap

top_size.description: The width in pixels of the top surface of a 1u keycap in pixels

scale.description: All dimensions in the final SVG are scaled by this factor, effectively increasing the resolution of the generated PNG.

colors.description: The colors to bind to named color variables used in the keycap set. If a color is not given it defaults to hidden.
